manifest.title: Audiobookshelf
manifest.author: advplyr
manifest.description:
## About

Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted audiobook and podcast server.

## Features

* Stream all audio formats on the fly
* Keeps progress per user and syncs across devices
* Backup your metadata + automated daily backups
* Chromecast support on the web app and android app
* Merge audio files into a single m4b
* Basic ebook support and ereader
* Open RSS feeds for podcasts and audiobooks
manifest.changelog:
* Update audiobookshelf to 2.32.1
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf/releases/tag/v2.32.1)
* Important: New authentication system was added in [v2.26.0](https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf/releases/tag/v2.26.0). See <https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf/discussions/4460> for details.
* Server crash matching with Audible provider [#4931](https://github.com/advplyr/audiobookshelf/issues/4931)
* More strings translated
* Finnish by [@pHamala](https://github.com/pHamala)
* Polish by [@MarcinKlejna](https://github.com/MarcinKlejna)
* Russian by [@renesat](https://github.com/renesat)
* Swedish by [@bittin](https://github.com/bittin)
manifest.postInstallMessage:
This app is pre-setup with an admin account. The initial credentials are: **Username**: admin
**Password**: changeme
Content can be uploaded into `/app/data/podcasts` and `/app/data/audiobooks`.
